price: 17. Allah nde akitisa buku na bosôló, mpe na emekelo. Mpe yo oyebi te tango mosusu ngonga yango ebelemi.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَنزَلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَٱلۡمِيزَانَۗ وَمَا يُدۡرِيكَ لَعَلَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ قَرِيبٞ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: al-lahu alladhī anzala al-kitāba bil-ḥaqi wal-mīzāna wamā yud'rīka laʿalla al-sāʿata qarībun
